descriptions.title: ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI 13th Gen ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI Motherboard features LGA 1700 socket and Z790 chipset which supports Intel Socket LGA1700 for 13th Gen Intel Core & 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron Processors. This motherboard comes with 4 x DIMM that supports DDR5 Dual-Channel RAM up to 128GB of memory with speeds up to 7200 MHz when overclocked. This provides you with increased multitasking and rendering capabilities. It comes with 5x M.2 PCIe and four SATA III storage interfaces allow you to combine an array of storage drives to build a massive gaming library. It also has a single PCIe 5.0 x16 slot that supports resource-intensive graphics cards, while two PCIe 4.0 x16 (in x4 mode) and one PCIe 3.0 x1 slots support a variety of utility cards. Several USB 2.0, 3.2 Gen 1, Gen 2, and Gen 2x2 interfaces are accessible via the back panel and internal headers, providing ample support for peripherals such as mice, keyboards, and controllers as well as resource-demanding devices such as external drives. Bluetooth 5.2 technology can be used by wireless devices to provide a reliable cable-free experience. Use Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) to connect to your wireless network, or the integrated 2.5 Gigabit Ethernet port if you prefer a wired connection.

descriptions.title: AI Overclocking
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI can boost performance with automatic AI overclocking and cooling, enhancing your games and productivity without sacrificing thermal capabilities. AI noise cancellation is an audio-focused utility that reduces background noise, allowing others to hear you more clearly when playing team-based games or delivering presentations remotely. GameFirst VI is an artificial intelligence networking tool that prioritizes and optimizes your network connection for smoother online gameplay, which is essential for competitive online titles.

descriptions.title: Enhanced Power Solution
descriptions.details: ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI delivers stable power throughout the entire motherboard, maintaining electrical volume whether performing simple tasks or operating at full power during resource-demanding processes, thanks to 16+1 70A power stages with ProCool II connectors, alloy chokes, and durable capacitors.

descriptions.title: Comprehensive Cooling
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI motherboard incorporates a large VRM heatsink for capacitors and chokes, as well as integrated double-sided M.2 heat sinks and a unique PCH fan-less heatsink, to ensure your system remains cool under heavy loads, delivering better thermal performance while preventing throttling. Fan expert 4 software and hybrid fan headers control fans and liquid pump elements for enhanced cooling that can be customized.

descriptions.title: ROG SupremeFX 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio
descriptions.details: Immerse yourself in your favorite games with the help of high-fidelity audio powered by the Savitech SV3H712 amplifier and ROG SupremeFX 7.1-channel ALC4080 codec. Premium capacitors and audio jacks with gold plating enhance audio conductivity for a dependable signal and reduce static and other interference.

descriptions.title: Leading Connectivity
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-E GAMING WIFI ATX Motherboard provides reliable connectivity for your peripherals between the internal headers and the backplate. Webcams, microphones, and external storage drives can transfer data at speeds of up to 5 and 10 Gb/s through USB-A and USB-C 3.2 Gen 1 and Gen 2 ports, respectively. For devices that require a lot of resources, like storage arrays and audio interfaces, a USB-C 3.2 Gen 2x2 port offers up to 20 Gb/s data transfer speed. In addition to facilitating data transfer, a front panel USB-C 3.2 Gen 2x2 port provides up to 30W Power Delivery to charge and support peripherals that require a lot of resources. With an internal Thunderbolt 4 header, you can increase your connectivity and take advantage of high-speed connectivity that supports quick transfer rates and Power Delivery technologies.

descriptions.title: MSI MEG Z790 ACE 13th and 12th Gen E-ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: The MSI MEG Z790 ACE Motherboard supports 13th /12th Gen Intel Core / Pentium / Celeron processors for LGA 1700 socket. PCIe 5.0 slots, Lightning Gen 5 x4 M.2, Dual Front USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 20G with one 60W USB Power Delivery. MSI MEG Z790 ACE features 8 Layer PCB with 2oz Thickened Copper. It provides higher performance and long-lasting system stability without any compromise. It also offers Audio Boost 5 HD. It is the ultimate audio solution with the latest premium ALC4082 audio processor combining ESS audio DAC and amplifier delivering a breathtaking experience. The MSI MEG Z790 ACE Motherboard comes with a 03-year warranty.

descriptions.title: Asus ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI DDR5 ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: The ASUS ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI DDR5 14th, 13th & 12th Gen ATX Motherboard is a top-of-the-line motherboard designed for gamers and enthusiasts looking to build a high-performance PC. It is equipped with an Intel LGA 1700 socket, making it ready for use with 13th-generation Intel Core and 12th-generation Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron processors. The Asus ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI motherboard features a robust power solution with 16 + 1 power stages rated for 80A, dual ProCool II power connectors, high-quality alloy chokes, and durable capacitors, providing stable power to support the latest multicore processors. It also boasts optimized VRM thermals with massive heat sinks connected by an L-shaped heat pipe, high-conductivity thermal pads, and an integrated I/O shroud. With four PCIe 4.0 M.2 slots all with heatsinks, including the tallest having a combo sink extension and backplate for additional cooling, the motherboard provides extensive M.2 support. Additionally, it offers abundant connectivity with a USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C rear I/O port and additional front panel connector, seven USB 3.2 Gen 2 and Gen 1 ports, PCIe 5.0 x16 SafeSlot, HDMI 2.1, and DisplayPort 1.4. The Asus ROG STRIX Z790-A GAMING WIFI 14th Gen Motherboard is equipped with built-in WiFi 6E (802.11ax) and 2.5Gb Intel Ethernet with ASUS LANGuard for high-performance networking. It also features intelligent control with ASUS-exclusive AI overclocking, AI II cooling, AI networking, and bi-directional AI noise cancellation to simplify setup and improve performance.

descriptions.title: Asus ROG X570 Crosshair VIII Hero WI-FI ATX AM4 Motherboard
descriptions.details: ROG Crosshair VIII Hero comes equipped with an optimized power-design layout and all the cooling headers you need to handle the prodigious power of the latest AMD Ryzen processors without performance-zapping thermal throttling.â€‹ ROG gives you powerful tools that make optimizing your system fast and easy. For those who relish fine-grained control, the UEFI BIOS has a wealth of advanced options organized into intuitive categories that provide the ability to tweak every aspect of your systemâ€‹. Conventional motherboards use single-ended sensing tapped from a location that isn't ideal, leading to a large disparity between the actual voltage fed to the CPU and the value reported to the software. The Hero features a differential sensing circuit that simplifies overclocking and tuning by allowing you to track voltages more accurately. The renowned ROG UEFI (BIOS) provides everything you need to configure, tweak, and tune your rig. It offers intelligently simplified options for newcomers to PC DIY, as well as comprehensive features for seasoned veterans. AI Suite 3's dashboard-style control panel lets you fine-tune almost every aspect of your system. Get the best balance between performance, cooling, stability, and efficiency via one simple and intuitive interface.â€‹ The TurboV Processing Unit (TPU) is an intelligent onboard micro-controller that provides an array of system-tuning features, including the ability to fine-tune voltages, monitor system stats and adjust overclocking parameters. ROG Crosshair VIII Hero offers advanced connectivity to ensure seamless gaming experiences. With the latest ultrafast networking, including Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and dual Ethernet with one 2.5G port, ROG Crosshair VIII Hero removes all bottlenecks for online and LAN play, minimizing lag and providing an overall smoother experience. Additionally, the M.2 supports AMD StoreMI technology to maximize the speed of your SSD for faster load times, and SupremeFX onboard audio provides superb sound while saving a PCIe slot.â€‹ ROG provides a range of intuitive software that enables easy control of your advanced gaming hardware and ensures seamless component compatibility. From RGB lighting, networking, and audio to storage optimization and more, ROG gives you the power to personalize your system just the way you want.â€‹ ROG Crosshair VIII Hero offers advanced connectivity to ensure seamless gaming experiences. With the latest ultrafast networking, including Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and dual Ethernet with one 2.5G port, ROG Crosshair VIII Hero removes all bottlenecks for online and LAN play, minimizing lag and providing an overall smoother experience. Additionally, the M.2 supports AMD StoreMI technology to maximize the speed of your SSD for faster load times, and SupremeFX onboard audio provides superb sound while saving a PCIe slot.â€‹ Gear up with ROG components, from graphics and monitors to mice and keyboards, and up your game with complementary aesthetics, control, and compatibility. The ROG ecosystem is more extensive than any competing brand, so enjoy greater choice as your system expands. GameFirst V is a ROG-exclusive tool that optimizes network traffic and your connection for faster, lag-free online gaming. Select the best Wi-Fi channel for maximum stability and minimum interference, team your gateways, and keep tabs on bandwidth-hogging apps, all from an intuitive interface that enables easy, on-the-fly adjustments. Armoury Crate is a new software utility designed to give you centralized control of supported ROG gaming products. From a single intuitive interface, Armoury Crate lets you easily customize RGB lighting and effects for every compatible device in your arsenal and synchronize them with Aura Sync for uniï¬�ed system lighting effects. The software also provides control of settings for a select and growing number of ROG products, including keyboard and mouse preferences as well as laptop overclocking and fan speeds, making it easier to tune the look and feel of your system. Armoury Crate even features dedicated product registration and ROG news areas to help you stay in touch with the ROG gaming community.

descriptions.title: MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: The MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI Motherboard supports 14th/13th /12th Gen Intel Core / Pentium / Celeron processors for LGA 1700 socket. This ATX motherboard, which uses the Intel Z790 chipset and the LGA 1700 socket, has four DDR4 RAM slots that allow twin-channel memory and speeds up to 7600+(OC) MHz. It comes with PCIe 5.0 slot, Lightning Gen 5 x4 M.2, USB 3.2 Gen 2x2. It also enables RAID 0, 1, 5, and 10 through SATA or 0, 1, and 5 via M.2. GPUs and other adaptor cards may be installed through PCIe 5.0 x16, PCIe 4.0 x16, PCIe 3.0 x16, and PCIe 3.0 x1 slots. It comes with an enlarged heatsink with a heat pipe, MOSFET thermal pads rated for 7W/mk, additional choke thermal pads, and M.2 Shield Frozr are built for a high-performance system and non-stop gaming experience. The 14th Gen Motherboard is equipped with 2.5 GbE Intel LAN and Wi-Fi 6E; quickly connects to wireless peripherals with Bluetooth 5.2. Upgraded network solution for professional and multimedia use. Delivers a secure, stable, and fast network connection. The Realtek ALC4080 audio codec offers 7.1 channel surround sound, and the rear ports can be used for analog or digital output. Connect connected peripherals through two USB 2.0, two USB 3.2 Gen 1, and three USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-A ports, or a USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C port. DisplayPort and HDMI are used to output video. A Flash BIOS button is also located on the rear I/O panel, and internal headers support front-panel USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C and USB 3.2 Gen 1 and 2.0 Type-A ports, RGB connections, chassis intrusion, a TPM module, and other features. The MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI 14th Gen Motherboard comes with a 03-year warranty.

descriptions.title: GIGABYTE Z790 AERO G ATX Motherboard
descriptions.details: The GIGABYTE Z790 AERO G ATX Motherboard comes with Intel Socket LGA 1700 that supports 13th and 12th Gen Series Processors. The motherboard comes with 4x SMD DIMMs with XMP 3.0 Memory Module Support. It offers support for DDR5 7600(O.C.) /7400(O.C.) /7200(O.C.) /7000(O.C.) /6800(O.C.) /6600(O.C.) / 6400(O.C.) / 6200(O.C.) / 6000(O.C.) / 5800(O.C.) / 5600(O.C.) / 5400(O.C.) / 5200(O.C.) / 4800 / 4000 memory modules. The sockets support up to 128 GB (32 GB single DIMM capacity) of system memory. It comes with a GIGABYTE VisionLINK port, and you can transfer data, video, and power charging via a single USB Type-C cable. The 14th Gen motherboard is equipped with the PCIe 5.0 x16 slot and M.2 socket designed to optimize multitasking and large workloads, which is also ready for a new PCIe 5.0 graphics card or storage device. It supports new PCIe 5.0 SSD with up to type 25110 M.2 slot designed to provide high power M.2 PCIe 5.0 SSD solutions. A total of five onboard M.2 slots are available for data-intensive tasks and creative work without additional configuration. The GIGABYTE Z790 AERO G is equipped with Intel 2.5Gb Ethernet provides an immediate boost to overall network performance, smooth video editing, and fast data transfers. Wi-Fi 6E brings the ability to conduct AR/VR experiences, get creative with fewer dropped connections, and download large files at faster speeds without lag. The advanced cooling solution also provides the perfect aesthetic heatsink design to keep your PC at an optimal temperature, preventing you from unexpected system crashes during the creative process. The GIGABYTE Z790 AERO G 14th Gen Motherboard comes with 3 years of warranty.
